title: The schema should be added as 'schemaname.Procedurename' when using the stored procedure
description: Bug 122105 - The schema should be added as 'schemaname.Procedurename' when using the stored procedure.
OB: Currently, when using the stored procedure, the schema is not being added to the procedure name.
EB: The behavior is incorrect. The schema should be added as 'schemaname.Procedurename' when using the stored procedure.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Create a new report.
2. Use a stored procedure.
